title: Implement telemedicine platform design from uploaded reference

requirements.text: Implement the main dashboard layout matching the uploaded design reference, including navigation structure, header layout, and overall page composition
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard layout matches the visual hierarchy from the design reference
Navigation elements are positioned as shown in the design
Header and main content areas follow the design specifications

requirements.text: Apply the color scheme, typography, and visual styling from the uploaded design reference throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Primary and secondary colors match the design reference
Typography (font families, sizes, weights) matches the design
Spacing and padding follow the design system

requirements.text: Create healthcare-specific UI components as shown in the design reference, including patient cards, appointment widgets, and medical information displays
acceptanceCriteria: Patient information cards match the design layout
Appointment scheduling interface follows design specifications
Medical data visualization components align with design reference

requirements.text: Implement the telemedicine consultation interface as depicted in the design, including video call placeholder area and consultation controls
acceptanceCriteria: Consultation interface layout matches design reference
Video call area is positioned and styled as shown
Consultation controls and buttons follow design patterns

requirements.text: Create backend data models for managing patients, appointments, and consultation sessions to support the telemedicine platform features
acceptanceCriteria: Patient records can be created and retrieved
Consultation session data can be stored and queried

requirements.text: Implement backend functions for CRUD operations on patients, appointments, and medical records
acceptanceCriteria: Create, read, update, and delete operations work for patient records
Appointment management functions are fully operational
Medical record operations maintain data integrity

constraints: Must match the visual design from the uploaded reference
Healthcare data must be handled securely in the backend
Use only Motoko for backend and React with TypeScript for frontend
nonGoals: Integration with external healthcare systems or APIs
SMS notifications or external messaging services

required: Medical professional avatar placeholder illustration for user profiles (doctor-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
Telemedicine hero banner with healthcare theme showing digital health concept (telemedicine-hero.dim_1200x400.png)
